This enables interactive exercises where users must complete a step before advancing.` }, { title: 'The notebook API', content: md`The \`notebook\` object lets workshops interact with the notebook: - \`notebook.cells\` \u2014 read-only array of \`{id, type, code}\` - \`notebook.scope\` \u2014 snapshot of current variable values - \`notebook.scrollTo(id)\` \u2014 scroll a cell into view - \`notebook.focus(id)\` \u2014 focus a cell\u2019s editor - \`notebook.addCell(type, code, afterId)\` \u2014 insert a new cell - \`notebook.run(ids)\` \u2014 execute specific cells The \`workshop()\` call returns \`{ goto, toggle, recheck }\` for programmatic control.` }, ])
